scenario_text.value:
Minoru is a bit...boisterous, isn’t he? Not
the most steady fellow.

Yep, that’s him for you. He has his good
points, I promise...

Hmph. We could be attacked at any moment,
and he could become a target.

Leave his safety to me. I assure you he will
be protected.
All right, I’ll leave it to you.

Minoru is under my watchful eye. You may
focus on the search for Aoi, Takuma.
